Self:
  Self: I'm the daddy!

Value:
  <p>The thing</p>
  
  <p>
    The thing
  </p>

Collection:
  <ul>
    <li>First: Yep</li>
    <li>Second: Default OK</li>
  </ul>

Shortcut collection:
  <ul>
    <li>First: Yep</li>
    <li>Second: Default OK</li>
  </ul>
  
Empty shortcut collection:
  <ul>
  </ul>

Shortcut collection strings:
  <p>
    Just a string, And another
  </p>

Collection of templates:
  <ul>
    <li>First: Default OK</li>
    <li>Second: Default OK</li>
  </ul>

Shortcut collection of templates:
  <ul>
    <li>First: Default OK</li>
    <li>Second: Default OK</li>
  </ul>
